Package business.entities.character.adventurer

Class Adventurer

java.lang.Object
business.entities.character.Character
business.entities.character.adventurer.Adventurer
Direct Known Subclasses:
Warrior
public class Adventurer extends Character
Class that represents an Adventurer, extends from Character.

  • Constructor Details

    • Adventurer

      public Adventurer(String name, String player, int xp, int body, int mind, int spirit, String characterClass)
      Constructs a new Adventurer with the specified parameters.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the Adventurer
      player - the player controlling the Adventurer
      xp - the experience points of the Adventurer
      body - the body attribute of the Adventurer
      mind - the mind attribute of the Adventurer
      spirit - the spirit attribute of the Adventurer
      characterClass - the character class of the Adventurer

    • Adventurer

      public Adventurer(Character that)
      Constructs a new Adventurer based on an existing Character.
      Parameters:
      that - the Character to create the Adventurer from

  • Method Details

    • canEvolve

      public boolean canEvolve()
      Checks if the Adventurer can evolve to a higher class (Warrior or Champion).
      Specified by:
      canEvolve in class Character
      Returns:
      true if the Adventurer can evolve, false otherwise

    • evolve

      public Character evolve()
      Evolves the Adventurer to a higher class and returns the evolved Character. If the Adventurer is in a level range between 4 and 7, will evolve to a Warrior. If the Adventurer is in a level range between 8 and 10, will evolve to a Champion. Otherwise, will stay as an Adventurer
      Specified by:
      evolve in class Character
      Returns:
      the evolved Character

    • rollInitiative

      public void rollInitiative(Dice dice)
      Rolls the initiative for the Adventurer using the provided dice. The initiative is calculated based on a dice roll and the Adventurer's spirit attribute.
      Specified by:
      rollInitiative in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice to use for the initiative roll

    • doPreparationAction

      public int doPreparationAction(Dice ignored)
      Performs the preparation action for the Adventurer, increasing the Adventurer's spirit attribute.
      Specified by:
      doPreparationAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      ignored - ignored dice parameter
      Returns:
      the increased value of the spirit attribute

    • isSelfPreparationAction

      public boolean isSelfPreparationAction()
      Checks if the Adventurer's preparation action is for his self.
      Specified by:
      isSelfPreparationAction in class Character
      Returns:
      true if the preparation action is self-motivated, false otherwise

    • doBattleAction

      public int doBattleAction(Dice dice, boolean ignored)
      Performs the battle action for the Adventurer, calculating the damage dealt.
      Specified by:
      doBattleAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice to use for the attack roll
      ignored - ignored parameter
      Returns:
      the calculated damage dealt

    • getDamageType

      Returns:
      the damage type

    • doShortRestAction

      public int doShortRestAction(Dice dice)
      Performs the short rest action for the Adventurer, healing the Adventurer's hit points.
      Specified by:
      doShortRestAction in class Character
      Parameters:
      dice - the dice to use for the healing roll
      Returns:
      the amount of hit points healed

    • passiveAbility

      public float passiveAbility()
      Returns the value of the Adventurer's passive ability. The Adventurer does not have a passive ability.
      Specified by:
      passiveAbility in class Character
      Returns:
      the value of the passive ability
